languages.text: "Если желаете показать Дому свою силу и неустрашимость, пригласите отступников первыми прикоснуться к тайнам Атласа, который они так ненавидят".

traits.locale_text: "Если желаете доказать противникам свою силу и мудрость, пригласите их первыми прикоснуться с тайнам Атласа, который они так ненавидят".

languages.text: "If you wish to show the House your strength and undauntable spirit, invite the renegades to be the first to touch the secrets of the Atlas they loathe so much."
languages.original_text: "Если желаете показать Дому свою силу и неустрашимость, пригласите отступников первыми прикоснуться к тайнам Атласа, который они так ненавидят".

traits.locale_text: "If you wish to show the House your strength and undauntable spirit, invite the renegades to be the first to touch the secrets of the Atlas they loathe so much."
"If you wish to show the House your strength and undauntable spirit, invite the renegades to be the first to touch the secrets of the Atlas they loathe so much."
"If you wish to show the House your strength and undauntable spirit, invite the renegades to be the first to touch the secrets of the Atlas they loathe so much."
"If you wish to show the House your strength and undauntable spirit, invite the renegades to be the first to touch the secrets of the Atlas they loathe so much."
"If you wish to show the House your strength and undauntable spirit, invite the renegades to be the first to touch the secrets of the Atlas they loathe so much."
"If you wish to show the House your strength and undauntable spirit, invite the renegades to be the first to touch the secrets of the Atlas they loathe so much."

languages.text: 「その強さと不屈の精神をオーセリオ家に示したいなら、アトラスの秘密に触れられるのを何よりも嫌う反逆派を呼びたまえ」
languages.original_text: "If you wish to show the House your strength and undauntable spirit, invite the renegades to be the first to touch the secrets of the Atlas they loathe so much."

traits.locale_text: 「その強さと不屈の精神をオーセリオ家に示したいなら、アトラスの秘密に触れられるのを何よりも嫌う反逆派を呼びたまえ」

languages.text: “如果你想向你的家族展示你的力量与不屈的决心，你可以邀请那些对圣仪深恶痛绝的叛乱分子，让他们成为第一个接触圣仪秘密的人。”
languages.original_text: "If you wish to show the House your strength and undauntable spirit, invite the renegades to be the first to touch the secrets of the Atlas they loathe so much."

traits.locale_text: “如果你想向你的家族展示你的力量与不屈的决心，你可以邀请那些对圣仪深恶痛绝的叛乱分子，让他们成为第一个接触圣仪秘密的人。”

languages.text: « Si vous voulez montrer à votre maison toute la force de votre volonté, invitez les renégats à être les premiers à toucher les secrets de cet Atlas qu'ils haïssent tant. »
languages.original_text: "If you wish to show the House your strength and undauntable spirit, invite the renegades to be the first to touch the secrets of the Atlas they loathe so much."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous voulez montrer à votre maison toute la force de votre volonté, invitez les renégats à être les premiers à toucher les secrets de cet Atlas qu'ils haïssent tant. »

languages.text: «Si quiere demostrar su fortaleza y su espíritu indómito a ojos de su casa, invite a los renegados y ofrézcales ser los primeros en tocar los secretos de ese Atlas que tanto aborrecen».
languages.original_text: "If you wish to show the House your strength and undauntable spirit, invite the renegades to be the first to touch the secrets of the Atlas they loathe so much."

traits.locale_text: «Si quiere demostrar su fortaleza y su espíritu indómito a ojos de su casa, invite a los renegados y ofrézcales ser los primeros en tocar los secretos de ese Atlas que tanto aborrecen».

languages.text: "Wenn Ihr dem Haus Eure Stärke und Euren unbeugsamen Willen demonstrieren wollt, ladet die Abtrünnigen ein, als Erste die Geheimnisse des Atlas zu berühren, den sie so verabscheuen."
languages.original_text: "If you wish to show the House your strength and undauntable spirit, invite the renegades to be the first to touch the secrets of the Atlas they loathe so much."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Ihr dem Haus Eure Stärke und Euren unbeugsamen Willen demonstrieren wollt, ladet die Abtrünnigen ein, als Erste die Geheimnisse des Atlas zu berühren, den sie so verabscheuen."

languages.text: "Hanene gücünü ve yılmak bilmez azmini göstermek istiyorsan hainleri, o nefret ettikleri Atlas'ın sırlarına ilk ulaşanlar olmaya çağırmalısın."
languages.original_text: "If you wish to show the House your strength and undauntable spirit, invite the renegades to be the first to touch the secrets of the Atlas they loathe so much."

traits.locale_text: "Hanene gücünü ve yılmak bilmez azmini göstermek istiyorsan, hainleri o kadar nefret ettikleri Atlas'ın sırlarına ilk ulaşanlara katılmaya çağırmalısın."
